solution_line_template: If Alexis has {alexis_multiple} times the combined number of mangoes Dilan and Ashley has, then they both have {alexis_mangoes} mangoes/{alexis_multiple} ={dilan_ashley_combined_mangoes} mangoes

The total number of mangoes for all of them is {dilan_ashley_combined_mangoes} mangoes + {alexis_mangoes} mangoes = <<{dilan_ashley_combined_mangoes}+{alexis_mangoes}={total_mangoes}>>{total_mangoes} mangoes
